messages.content: Magna assists customers with unrecognized credit card charges, explaining and offering refunds.
I don't recognize a charge on my card.

Hello! Thank you for reaching out to Magna customer support. I understand that you have a question regarding a charge on your card statement. In order to assist you further, could you please provide me with the first 6 (six) digits and the last 4 (four) digits of the card that was charged? This information will help me locate the specific transaction in our system. Please note that we never ask for the full card number for security purposes. Thank you!
